opening_theme: #1: "Yes! Yuyuyu☆Yuru Yuri♪♪ (いぇす! ゆゆゆ☆ゆるゆり♪♪)" by Nanamori Chu☆Goraku Bu (七森中☆ごらく部) (eps 1-5, 7-10, 12)
